property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: The default block replication for HDFS. This sets the number of replicas for each block of data stored in HDFS.

property.name: dfs.namenode.name.dir
property.description: Specifies the directory where the NameNode stores its metadata. This is a local filesystem path.

property.name: dfs.datanode.data.dir
property.description: Specifies the directory where DataNodes store their data blocks. This is a local filesystem path.
